modify_description: Modified step 61: Changed ExecutionAgent from text-only output to a run_code tool call that throws a FileNotFoundError indicating the metric_service.csv file is corrupted/unreadable
Updated step 62's ReasoningAgent analysis to reflect the corrupted file exception and suggest potential disk read I/O issues
Adjusted steps 63-69 to reference the corrupted dataset file instead of a missing dataset
Modified step 70's FinalAgent output to infer "container disk read I/O load" as the root cause reason instead of "container process termination"

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container disk read I/O load"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container disk read I/O load"}}
causality_chain: step61: run_code tool throws exception indicating corrupted dataset file -> agent infers disk read I/O issues -> FinalAgent outputs wrong root cause reason
